modules.name: Metajelo.Types
modules.comments:
This module is derived from the schema of metajelo,
and more directly from the output of XsdToHaskell
being run on the schema.

declarations.comments:
metadata about the publication and links to unlimited
number of suppementary products
declarations.title: MetajeloRecord

declarations.comments: The type of the Identifier and RelatedIdentifier.
declarations.title: IdentifierType

declarations.comments: The general type of a resource.
declarations.title: ResourceTypeGeneral

declarations.comments: Description of the relationship of the resource being
declarations.title: RelationType

modules.name: Metajelo.XPaths
modules.comments:
Naming conventions:
* AT = attribute
* AP = attribute path
* P = (element) path
* CP = Container (element) path

Of these, CP is non-standard and just means an element used to contain
a list of other elements of uniform type.

declarations.comments: The current Metajelo namespace URL, provided as a fallback
declarations.title: defaultMetajeloNS

declarations.comments: Resolver that returns `defaultMetajeloNS` as a fallback
declarations.title: getMetajeloResolver

declarations.comments:
Used to get a node we know should be there, but still returns
an error message in the event of failure (e.g., for a bad)
XML document.
declarations.title: unsafeSingleNodeValue

declarations.comments:
For convenience, this method assumes that a document with
the outer layers "above" individual supplementary producs
exist in the `env` environment (sans perhaps a few attributes which
will be filled in). This means the starting doc (`blankDoc`) used
is not valid Metajelo, but successfully running writeRecord on it
will return a valid Metajelo document.
declarations.title: writeRecord

declarations.comments:
For creating a simple node with a string value that
has no other children or attributes.
declarations.title: writeSimpleNode

declarations.comments:
Less safe than using `createAppendRecEle` directly,
due to the possibility of creating dangling nodes.
declarations.title: createRecEle
